SELECT #CITY_GUBN# CITY_GUBN ,#YEAR_MONT1# YEAR_MONT1 ,#YEAR_MONT2# YEAR_MONT2 , OUTS_CODE , OUTS_NAME , ITEM_CODE , HIGH_NAME , NVL(SUJU_AMTX,0) AS SUJU_AMTX , NVL(SUJU_VATX,0) AS SUJU_VATX , NVL(SUMX_AMTX,0) AS SUMX_AMTX , CITY_CODE , NVL(SOSO_AMTX,0) AS SOSO_AMTX , NVL(JUMI_AMTX,0) AS JUMI_AMTX , NVL(SUMX_AMTX2,0) AS SUMX_AMTX2 FROM ( SELECT 0 AS SORT_GUBN ,A.OUTS_CODE AS OUTS_CODE ,C.CUST_NAME AS OUTS_NAME ,D.ITEM_CODE ,E.HIGH_NAME ,SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) AS SUJU_AMTX ,TRUNC(SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) * 0.1) AS SUJU_VATX ,SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) + (SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) * 0.1) AS SUMX_AMTX ,C.CITY_CODE , TRUNC(NVL(SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX),0) * 0.03,-1) AS SOSO_AMTX /* 예수금(자유직업소득세) */ , TRUNC(NVL(SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX),0) * 0.03,-1)* 0.1 AS JUMI_AMTX /* 예수금(자유직업주민세) */ , SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) - (TRUNC(NVL(SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX),0) * 0.03,-1) + TRUNC(NVL(SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX),0) * 0.03,-1)* 0.1) AS SUMX_AMTX2 FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON A.OUTS_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_CLASXM D ON A.OUTS_CODE = D.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ITEM_CODE AS HIGH_LEVL , CODE_NAME AS HIGH_NAME FROM PD_CODEXM WHERE MEMO_FILD = 'TYPE' GROUP BY ITEM_CODE, CODE_NAME )E ON D.ITEM_CODE = E.HIGH_LEVL LEFT JOIN TM_OFFICE F ON F.ACCT_GUBN = '100' AND F.OFFI_GUBN ='1' WHERE 1=1
/* AND NVL(C.BIZR_NUMB,' ') != F.BSNS_NUMB */ GROUP BY A.OUTS_CODE ,C.CUST_NAME ,D.ITEM_CODE,E.HIGH_NAME,C.CITY_CODE ORDER BY SORT_GUBN,OUTS_NAME ASC )A WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY SORT_GUBN, CITY_CODE ASC, SUJU_AMTX DESC
